QuestData.Title: Surprise Backup
QuestData.Description:
<You find a torn Horde missive on the ground...
It appears that a group of forsaken, led by a man named Chadwick Paxton, were sent here to investigate Nazmir.
You're unable to discern why they were sent here, but there are coordinates that indicate where they were going.
You may be able to find the scouts at the coordinates and enlist their aid in fighting the blood trolls.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Chadwick Paxton, leader of the Forsaken Scouting Party.
